xRequestParameters.name: authorize.currency
xRequestParameters.description: The currency of the parameter amount

xRequestParameters.name: authorize.amount
xRequestParameters.description: The amount to authorize. Defined in minor units

xRequestParameters.name: authorize.orderid
xRequestParameters.description: The merchants order id

xRequestParameters.name: authorize.reference
xRequestParameters.description: The merchants referrence value

xRequestParameters.name: url.accept
xRequestParameters.description: URL to page to redirect to after successful payment

xRequestParameters.name: callbacks[].callback.url
xRequestParameters.description: If the payment is successful a server-to-server request is made to the defined URL

xRequestParameters.name: url.decline
xRequestParameters.description: URL to page to redirect to if the payment is declined

xRequestParameters.name: authorize.clientipaddress
xRequestParameters.description: The IP address of the client/cardholder

xRequestParameters.name: authorize.instantcaptureamount
xRequestParameters.description: Amount to capture once the authorizations is completed. Potential added fee will be captured if the value is equal to amount. Set capturemulti if the value is less and amount and the remaining amount is expected to be captured later

xRequestParameters.name: authorize.capturemulti
xRequestParameters.description: Enables to capture multiple times. Acquirers handles this differently and may not reserve the amount

xRequestParameters.name: invoice.currency
xRequestParameters.description: The currency of the total and invoice lines

xRequestParameters.name: invoicetotal.amount
xRequestParameters.description: The total amount without VAT

xRequestParameters.name: invoicetotal.amountinclvat
xRequestParameters.description: The total amount with VAT

xRequestParameters.name: invoicetotal.vatamount
xRequestParameters.description: The VAT of the total amount

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.id
xRequestParameters.description: The id or SKU of the product on the invoice line

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.linenumber
xRequestParameters.description: The number of the invoice line

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.description
xRequestParameters.description: A short description of the invoice line

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.text
xRequestParameters.description: A descriptive text of the invoice line

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.quantity
xRequestParameters.description: The quantity of the product in the invoice line

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.unit
xRequestParameters.description: The unit of the quantity

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.unitprice
xRequestParameters.description: The price of one unit without VAT

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.unitpriceinclvat
xRequestParameters.description: The price of one unit including VAT

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.unitpricevatamount
xRequestParameters.description: The VAT of one unit

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.totalprice
xRequestParameters.description: The total price of all units including VAT. quantity * unitprice

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.totalpriceinclvat
xRequestParameters.description: The total price of all units without VAT. quantity * unitpriceinclvat

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.totalpricevatamount
xRequestParameters.description: The total VAT of all units. quantity * unitpricevatamount

xRequestParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.vat
xRequestParameters.description: The VAT in percentages

xResponseParameters.description: Origin of the action code. If this begins with ePay the origin is ePay's system.

xResponseParameters.description: The last evaluated key. For next page set exclusivestartkey to this value

xResponseParameters.name: paging.itemsreturned
xResponseParameters.description: Number of items returned in the list

xResponseParameters.name: transactionid
xResponseParameters.description: The ID of the created transaction. Used as reference to handle the transaction

xResponseParameters.name: url
xResponseParameters.description: The url to redirect to complete the authorization. For example the url is used for redirecting to 3D Secure authorization

xResponseParameters.name: method
xResponseParameters.description: How to redirect to the returned url. Possible values: noredirect, redirect or post

xResponseParameters.description: If the parameter method is post this contains a list of parameters to build a HTML form with action POST.

xRequestParameters.name: paymentcard.threeddata
xRequestParameters.description: If a 3D Secure authorization have been performed. Place the 3D data from the PayerAuthenticate response here

xRequestParameters.name: threeddata.cavv
xRequestParameters.description: CAVV from the payer authentification response. A cardholder authentication verification value returned by the ACS to be used when authorizing with the acquiring bank

xRequestParameters.name: threeddata.cavvalgorithm
xRequestParameters.description: CAVV algorithm value from the payer authentification response. The algorithm used to obtain the CAVV

xRequestParameters.name: threeddata.eci
xRequestParameters.description: ECI value from the payer authentification response. A status, denoting whether 3D authentication was successful

xRequestParameters.name: threeddata.time
xRequestParameters.description: Time value from the payer authentification response. A timestamp indicating when the ACS signed the PARes value

xRequestParameters.name: threeddata.xid
xRequestParameters.description: XId value from the payer authentification response. The base-64 encoded transation id as sent to the ACS

xRequestParameters.name: threeddata.status
xRequestParameters.description: Transaction status from the payer authentification response. A status, denoting whether 3D authentication was successful or not

xRequestParameters.name: acquirername
xRequestParameters.description: Specify the acquirer to be used

xRequestParameters.name: subscription.action
xRequestParameters.description: The action to perform, possible values: none, create or update

xRequestParameters.name: subscription.description
xRequestParameters.description: Custom description of the subscription

xRequestParameters.name: subscription.id
xRequestParameters.description: If action is update set the ID of the subscription to update

xRequestParameters.name: securitylevel
xRequestParameters.description: Specify the security level to be used

xResponseParameters.description: Only returned for lists where paging is available

xResponseParameters.description: The last evaluated key. For next page set exclusivestartkey to this value

xResponseParameters.name: paging.itemsreturned
xResponseParameters.description: Number of items returned in the list

xResponseParameters.name: transactionid
xResponseParameters.description: The ID of the created transaction. Used as reference to handle the transaction

xResponseParameters.name: url
xResponseParameters.description: The url to redirect to complete the authorization. For example the url is used for redirecting to 3D Secure authorization

xResponseParameters.name: method
xResponseParameters.description: How to redirect to the returned url. Possible values: noredirect, redirect or post

xResponseParameters.name: parameters
xResponseParameters.description: If the parameter method is post this contains a list of parameters to build a HTML form with action POST.

xResponseParameters.name: parameters[].input.name
xResponseParameters.description: Parameter name

xResponseParameters.name: parameters[].input.value
xResponseParameters.description: Parameter value

xResponseParameters.name: subscriptionid
xResponseParameters.description: The id of the created subscription. Used as reference when further authorizing using this subscription

xResponseParameters.description: The total amount with VAT

xResponseParameters.description: The unit of the quantity

xResponseParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.unitprice

xResponseParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.unitpriceinclvat
xResponseParameters.description: The price of one unit including VAT

xResponseParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.unitpricevatamount
xResponseParameters.description: The VAT of one unit

xResponseParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.totalprice
xResponseParameters.description: The total price of all units including VAT. quantity * unitprice

xResponseParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.totalpriceinclvat
xResponseParameters.description: The total price of all units without VAT. quantity * unitpriceinclvat

xResponseParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.totalpricevatamount
xResponseParameters.description: The total VAT of all units. quantity * unitpricevatamount

xResponseParameters.name: lines[].invoiceline.vat
xResponseParameters.description: The VAT in percentages

questionid.description: The id of the question answered

code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the language to use

currency.description: The currency of the total and invoice lines

zip.description: The ZIP code to the receiver adress
The ZIP code to the customers adress

id.description: The id or SKU of the product on the invoice line

linenumber.description: The number of the invoice line

description.description: A short description of the invoice line

text.description: A descriptive text of the invoice line

quantity.description: The quantity of the product in the invoice line

unitprice.description: The price of one unit without VAT

unitpriceinclvat.description: The price of one unit including VAT

totalprice.description: The total price of all units including VAT. quantity * unitprice

totalpriceinclvat.description: The total price of all units without VAT. quantity * unitpriceinclvat

totalpricevatamount.description: The total VAT of all units. quantity * unitpricevatamount

vatamount.description: The VAT of the total amount

currency.description: The currency of the parameter amount

amount.description: The amount to authorize. Defined in minor units

clientipaddress.description: The IP address of the client/cardholder

instantcaptureamount.description: Amount to capture once the authorizations is completed. Potential added fee will be captured if the value is equal to amount. Set capturemulti if the value is less and amount and the remaining amount is expected to be captured later

capturemulti.description: Enables to capture multiple times. Acquirers handles this differently and may not reserve the amount

accept.description: URL to page to redirect to after successful payment

decline.description: URL to page to redirect to if the payment is declined

url.description: If the payment is successful a server-to-server request is made to the defined URL

transactionid.description: The ID of the created transaction. Used as reference to handle the transaction

url.description: The url to redirect to complete the authorization. For example the url is used for redirecting to 3D Secure authorization

method.description: How to redirect to the returned url. Possible values: noredirect, redirect or post

parameters.description: If the parameter method is post this contains a list of parameters to build a HTML form with action POST.

subscriptionid.description: The id of the created subscription. Used as reference when further authorizing using this subscription

currency.description: The currency of the total and invoice lines

paging.description: Only returned for lists where paging is available

lastevaluatedkey.description: The last evaluated key. For next page set exclusivestartkey to this value

itemsreturned.description: Number of items returned in the list

source.description: Origin of the action code. If this begins with ePay the origin is ePay's system.

code.description: The response code from the source

type.description: Type of the action code (e.g. generalerror)

enduser.description: Message to show the end user

merchant.description: Message to show the merchant. This may not be shown to the end user

transactionid.description: The ID of the created transaction. Used as reference to handle the transaction

url.description: The url to redirect to complete the authorization. For example the url is used for redirecting to 3D Secure authorization

method.description: How to redirect to the returned url. Possible values: noredirect, redirect or post

parameters.description: If the parameter method is post this contains a list of parameters to build a HTML form with action POST.

subscriptionid.description: The id of the created subscription. Used as reference when further authorizing using this subscription

acquirername.description: Specify the acquirer to be used

securitylevel.description: Specify the security level to be used

action.description: The action to perform, possible values: none, create or update

id.description: If action is update set the ID of the subscription to update

cardnumber.description: The cardnumber printed on the card

expmonth.description: The expiration month as printed on the card

expyear.description: The last two digits of the expiration year as printed on the card

cvc.description: The verification code as printed on the card

threeddata.description: If a 3D Secure authorization have been performed. Place the 3D data from the PayerAuthenticate response here

cavv.description: CAVV from the payer authentification response. A cardholder authentication verification value returned by the ACS to be used when authorizing with the acquiring bank

cavvalgorithm.description: CAVV algorithm value from the payer authentification response. The algorithm used to obtain the CAVV

eci.description: ECI value from the payer authentification response. A status, denoting whether 3D authentication was successful

time.description: Time value from the payer authentification response. A timestamp indicating when the ACS signed the PARes value

xid.description: XId value from the payer authentification response. The base-64 encoded transation id as sent to the ACS

status.description: Transaction status from the payer authentification response. A status, denoting whether 3D authentication was successful or not

transactionid.description: The ID of the created transaction. Used as reference to handle the transaction

url.description: The url to redirect to complete the authorization. For example the url is used for redirecting to 3D Secure authorization

method.description: How to redirect to the returned url. Possible values: noredirect, redirect or post

parameters.description: If the parameter method is post this contains a list of parameters to build a HTML form with action POST.

subscriptionid.description: The id of the created subscription. Used as reference when further authorizing using this subscription
